title: 2-Bedroom Apartment Homes, Business Center and Fitness Center
map_address: 10785 E Exposition Ave near S Havana St
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome to Park Place at Expo Apartments', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 16', 'OR Text', '16', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Park Place at Expo, a welcoming community of studio, one, and two-bedroom Aurora, Colorado apartments for rent.', 'Conveniently located near I-225 and the light rail, your home will provide quick and easy access to everywhere you need to be.', 'If you’re a lover of nature, head down the road to Expo Park and soak up the sunshine and greenery.', 'Take care of all of your shopping needs at the nearby Gardens on Havana, and always look forward to coming home to your cozy apartment at the end of each day.', 'Features:', 'Plank-Wood Flooring*, Modern Kitchen Appliance Package including Disposal, Spacious Walk-In Closets*, Newly Renovated Studio, 1-, and 2-Bedroom Homes', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Business Center, Pet-Friendly Community, Community Playground, 24-Hour Fitness Center, Sparkling, Heated Swimming Pool and Sun Deck, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, Multiple Community Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills, 24-Hour On-Site Laundry Facilities, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400 Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'UCknZjZWS3S9']
